publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-599 Karen Gillon: Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations-That the Parliament congratulates all those who have been involved in the Lanark hydros at Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations over the last 75 years; acknowledges that this was the first hydro-electric scheme in Scotland to serve the public supply, and welcomes recent investment which will see the stations continuing to deliver clean, green energy to homes and businesses in years to come.

S2M-599 Karen Gillon: Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations-That the Parliament congratulates all those who have been involved in the Lanark hydros at Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations over the last 75 years; acknowledges that this was the first hydro-electric scheme in Scotland to serve the public supply, and welcomes recent investment which will see the stations continuing to deliver clean, green energy to homes and businesses in years to come. Supported by: Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-599 Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations (lodged on 13 November 2003) Sarah Boyack*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-599 Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations (lodged on 13 November 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-599 Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations (lodged on 13 November 2003) Trish Godman*
S2M-599 Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations (lodged on 13 November 2003) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-599 Bonnington and Stonebyres Power Stations (lodged on 13 November 2003) John Swinburne*
